00046 class SIM_API cModule : public cComponent //implies noncopyable
00047 {
00048     friend class cGate;
00049     friend class cSimulation;

00066     class SIM_API GateIterator
00067     {
00068       private:
00069         const cModule *module;
00070         int descIndex;
00071         bool isOutput;
00072         int index;
00073 
00074       private:
00075         void advance();
00076         cGate *current() const;
00077 
00078       public:
00082         GateIterator(const cModule *m)  {init(m);}
00083 
00087         void init(const cModule *m);
00088 
00093         cGate *operator()() const {cGate *result=current(); ASSERT(result||end()); return result;}
00094 
00098         bool end() const;
00099 
00105         cGate *operator++(int);
00106 
00111         cGate *operator+=(int k);
00112     };
00113 
00126     class SIM_API SubmoduleIterator
00127     {
00128       private:
00129         cModule *p;
00130 
00131       public:
00135         SubmoduleIterator(const cModule *m)  {init(m);}
00136 
00140         void init(const cModule *m)  {p = m ? const_cast<cModule *>(m->firstsubmodp) : NULL;}
00141 
00147         cModule *operator()() const {return p;}
00148 
00152         bool end() const  {return (bool)(p==NULL);}
00153 
00159         cModule *operator++(int)  {if (!p) return NULL; cModule *t=p; p=p->nextp; return t;}
00160     };
00161 
00167     class SIM_API ChannelIterator
00168     {
00169       private:
00170         std::vector<cChannel *> channels;
00171         int k;
00172 
00173       public:
00177         ChannelIterator(const cModule *parentmodule) {init(parentmodule);}
00178 
00182         void init(const cModule *parentmodule);
00183 
00188         cChannel *operator()() const {return k < (int)channels.size() ? channels[k] : NULL;}
00189 
00193         bool end() const {return k == (int)channels.size();}
00194 
00201         cChannel *operator++(int) {return end() ? NULL : channels[k++];}
00202     };
00203 
00204   private:
00205     static std::string lastmodulefullpath; // cached result of last getFullPath() call
00206     static const cModule *lastmodulefullpathmod; // module of lastmodulefullpath
00207 
00208   private:
00209     enum {
00210         FL_BUILDINSIDE_CALLED = 128, // whether buildInside() has been called
00211         FL_RECORD_EVENTS = 256, // enables recording events in this module
00212     };
00213 
00214   protected:
00215     mutable char *fullpath; // cached fullPath string (caching is optional, so it may be NULL)
00216     mutable char *fullname; // buffer to store full name of object
00217     int mod_id;             // id (subscript into cSimulation)
00218     static bool cachefullpath; // whether to cache the fullPath string or not
00219 
00220     // Note: parent module is stored in ownerp -- a module is always owned by its parent
00221     // module. If ownerp cannot be cast to a cModule, the module has no parent module
00222     // (e.g. the system module which is owned by the global object 'simulation').
00223     cModule *prevp, *nextp; // pointers to sibling submodules
00224     cModule *firstsubmodp;  // pointer to first submodule
00225     cModule *lastsubmodp;   // pointer to last submodule (needed for efficient append operation)
00226 
00227     typedef std::set<cGate::Name> NamePool;
00228     static NamePool namePool;
00229     int descvSize;    // size of the descv array
00230     cGate::Desc *descv; // array with one element per gate or gate vector
00231 
00232     int idx;      // index if module vector, 0 otherwise
00233     int vectsize; // vector size, -1 if not a vector
00234 
00235   public:
00236     // internal: currently used by init
00237     void setRecordEvents(bool e)  {setFlag(FL_RECORD_EVENTS,e);}
00238     bool isRecordEvents() const  {return flags&FL_RECORD_EVENTS;}
00239 
00240   protected:
00241     // internal: called from destructor, recursively unsubscribes all listeners
00242     void releaseListeners();
00243 
00244     // internal: has initialize() been called?
00245     bool buildInsideCalled() const {return flags&FL_BUILDINSIDE_CALLED;}
00246 
00247     // internal: called from callInitialize(). Does one stage for this submodule
00248     // tree, and returns true if there are more stages to do
00249     virtual bool initializeModules(int stage);
00250 
00251     // internal: called from callInitialize(). Does one stage for channels in this
00252     // submodule tree, and returns true if there are more stages to do
00253     virtual bool initializeChannels(int stage);
00254 
00255     // internal: called when a message arrives at a gate which is no further
00256     // connected (that is, getNextGate() is NULL)
00257     virtual void arrived(cMessage *msg, cGate *ongate, simtime_t t) = 0;
00258 
00259     // internal: sets the module ID. Called as part of the module creation process.
00260     virtual void setId(int n);
00261 
00262     // internal: sets module name and its index within vector (if module is
00263     // part of a module vector). Called as part of the module creation process.
00264     virtual void setNameAndIndex(const char *s, int i, int n);
00265 
00266     // internal: called from setName() and setIndex()
00267     void updateFullName();
00268 
00269     // internal: called from setName() and setIndex()
00270     void updateFullPath();
00271 
00272     // internal: inserts a submodule. Called as part of the module creation process.
00273     void insertSubmodule(cModule *mod);
00274 
00275     // internal: removes a submodule
00276     void removeSubmodule(cModule *mod);
00277 
00278     // internal: "virtual ctor" for cGate, because in cPlaceholderModule we need
00279     // different gate objects; type should be INPUT or OUTPUT, but not INOUT
00280     virtual cGate *createGateObject(cGate::Type type);

00284 
00285     // internal: called from deleteGate()

00288     // internal: add a new gatedesc by expanding gatedescv[]
00289     cGate::Desc *addGateDesc(const char *name, cGate::Type type, bool isVector);
00290 
00291     // internal: finds a gate descriptor with the given name in gatedescv[];
00292     // ignores (but returns) potential "$i"/"$o" suffix in gatename
00293     int findGateDesc(const char *gatename, char& suffix) const;
00294 
00295     // internal: like findGateDesc(), but throws an error if the gate does not exist
00296     cGate::Desc *gateDesc(const char *gatename, char& suffix) const;

00299     void adjustGateDesc(cGate *g, cGate::Desc *newvec);
00300 
00301     // internal: called as part of the destructor

00305     // internal: may only be called between simulations, when no modules exist
00306     static void clearNamePools();

00312     cGate *gateByOrdinal(int k) const;
